articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: Coronavirus may be the straw that breaks the back of oil fracking
articles.description: When oil is too cheap, fracking is unprofitable. Add that to existing problems and what got the world through 10 years of escalating oil use.

articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: Coronavirus wreaks havoc on Chinese food producers, sending inflation soaring
articles.description: Last month the inflation rate for food and tobacco in China clocked in at 15.2%.

articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Apple’s coronavirus problem
articles.description: Apple isn't saying much about Coronavirus, but that hasn't stopped analysts and industry experts from speculating about its impact on iPhone 11 and iPhone 12 shipments.

articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: From apple juice to antibiotics: Coronavirus epidemic could cause U.S. shortages
articles.description: Early effects are already being felt.

articles.author: jonathanvanian2015
articles.title: Facebook cancels conference while IBM pulls out of one due to coronavirus fears
articles.description: Facebook cancelled a marketing conference in San Francisco while IBM pulled out of the RSA security conference in the same city.
